properties.name: value
properties.description: Represent the array of objects with properties that will be passed into notification component

properties.name: width
properties.description: Setup width of the notification list component

properties.name: title
properties.description: Represent the title of the notification list component

properties.name: titleRight
properties.description: Represent the right title of the notification list component

properties.name: short
properties.description: Responsible for displaying notification list with short type without right block

events.name: active
events.description: Dispatched when the click is triggered by someone of notification item, contain notification object with on that click was triggered

events.name: titleRightClick
events.description: Dispatched when the click is triggered on the right title of the header
